description: This file declares internal functions for the Slap Bmc2 Output Object in the Service Logic Aggregation Plane (SLAP), including reset, clear, write, erase line, and move cursor functionalities.

methods.name: SlapBmc2OutoReset
methods.description: Resets the internal state of the Slap Bmc2 Output Object.

methods.name: SlapBmc2OutoClear
methods.description: Clears the output or internal buffer of the object.

methods.name: SlapBmc2OutoWrite
methods.description: Writes the provided content string to the output.

methods.name: SlapBmc2OutoEraseLine
methods.description: Erases the current line in the output.

methods.name: SlapBmc2OutoMoveCursor
methods.description: Moves the cursor in a specified direction (UP/DOWN/LEFT/RIGHT/HOME/END).
